Text:
Be careful with this upgrade

Any problems with this 'upgrade'? Has somebody tested it yet?
On Macupdate.com many users are reporting about freezers of Toast after upgrading to 11.0.5, Drives are not found .....

---------------------------------------------
Never had a problem with Toast until now: After upgrading to Toast 11.0.5 (through in-app update) Toast keeps crashing on me -- more specifically, I don't get beyond the first Toast Setup assistant window -- the program freezes and then crashes; in short I can't launch the program anymore. Tried erasing preferences and repairing permissions -- didn't help. I'm on Lion 10.7.3. My rating reflects the latest update: 11.0.5. 
-----
Version 11.0.5 hosed my DVD writer after installing 11.0.5. Gets 99 percent done and then just freezes and never completes the burn.
-----
And it still reports 'no recorder found' under the latest developer release of OS 10.8. Tried to gently hint to Roxio last week that this was a problem. Got a snotty response that they wait for the public release before addressing problems from the public. No soup for me.

nobody2007,

I tested it and had no problems. Did the archive you use come from this torrent?


If so maybe the torrent got corrupted somehow...

DP
